answers.answer: Can you explain what you mean by your body not holding water, are you urinating alot, are you having any burning or pain when you do urinate? If so, you may have a urinary tract infection or and or a kidney infection. You should see your Dr for some testing. Starting with a test to see if you have a urinary tract infection, and second for diabetes.

question: BODY NOT HOLDING WATER AND HUNG OVER FEELING
title: body not holding water and hung over feeling 24/7
